channel.title: Game on Mon Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Game on Mon Portfolio

item.title: [NEW] Go_Gamedle in GoLang 🐹!
item.description:
🐙 Github source here 🐙

Go_Gamedle in GoLang 🐹!

Overview of the game

Go_Gamedle is a simple game that aim to guess a game from a cover image or a description. The game is written in GoLang and use the gin-gonic to display an html page with the game.

🚧 currently Working In Progress 🚧

What does this project use ?

  • GoLang
  • Gin (Web framework in GoLang)
  • HTML
  • CSS (Bulma CSS for convenience)

And mostly the API of IGDB which is a video game database.

🐙 Github source here 🐙

Go_Gamedle in GoLang 🐹!

Overview of the game

Go_Gamedle is a simple game that aim to guess a game from a cover image or a description. The game is written in GoLang and use the gin-gonic to display an html page with the game.

🚧 currently Working In Progress 🚧

What does this project use ?

  • GoLang
  • Gin (Web framework in GoLang)
  • HTML
  • CSS (Bulma CSS for convenience)

And mostly the API of IGDB which is a video game database.
